answers.answer: I take metfrormin and it never gave me false positives even before.  YOu must have gotten positive earlier because of ovidril and negative because it was already out of your system and there are no pregnancy hormones present to detect yet.  NOw that you have a positive you might be pregnant since you got a negative first then positive.. question: I am wondering if metaformin has hcg?
